scripts.get-data-cn: if not exist "ffxiv-datamining-cn" (git clone https://github.com/thewakingsands/ffxiv-datamining-cn ffxiv-datamining-cn) else (cd ffxiv-datamining-cn && git pull)
scripts.get-data-ko: if not exist "ffxiv-datamining-ko" (git clone https://github.com/Ra-Workspace/ffxiv-datamining-ko ffxiv-datamining-ko) else (cd ffxiv-datamining-ko && git pull)
